page.title: 18 EDUCATION-IN THE FIELD
page.content:
AN ACCOUNT OF A MORNING'S FIELD WORK:-
We went for a walk equipped with four forms.One was a map,another had spaces for ua to fill in what we felt,saw, smelt and our likes and dislikes.The third was a tally chart upon which we had to tally house types,public places ,waste land etc.on the fourth sheet we noted how busy the roads were.We had to note these things every 20 paces.On our our walk we went down King's St. Lane and Bearwood Rd.Everyone had special jobs to do.It really made us notice things in our village.Some things we had taken for granted or never even noticed.
